## Graph.node() method

Retrieves a node by id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
node(id: NodeId): Node<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | [NodeId](./workflow.nodeid.md) | the node identifier |

<b>Returns:</b>

Node&lt;T&gt;

## Exceptions

- if the id is not found
